text: Moderator: Thank you. So now let's talk about candies. So what's your favorite kind of candy? Do you have something in mind?
Iris: Soft candy.
Moderator: Soft candy? Specific?
Iris: Juicy, colorful, and beer.
Moderator: Beer? So why you like it?
Iris: Because I like the feeling chewing them. I get relax and my stress is out when I'm chewing. And it's so sweet.
Moderator: Yeah, I can feel that way. How about others?
Penny: Big Rabbit. That's the flavor of nostalgia and childhood.
Moderator: Yah, nostalgia and childhood. How about the others?
Mia: Hershey's
Moderator: Hershey's? Specific reason?
Mia: Um, I'm just wondering whether chocolate could be included into candies.
Moderator: Yeah, sure.
Mia: Um, I think it is sweet.
Moderator: Do you like chocolate because it is sweet?
Mia: Yes.
Echo: I like chocolate too, because some of them are not so sweet so I like chocolate.
Moderator: So you don't buy too sweet chocolate.
Echo: Yes.
Moderator: Yeah, so someone mention sweet, so how about the others?
Zoe: I quite like one of the Japanese brand called "Chew-Chew", that
Zoe: is very um..chewing so that I could chew to some extent and it's also sweet and that the way I eat it is very interesting.
Moderator: So you like the way you eat it.
Zoe: Yes.
Matthew: Um..the gummy? the colors and designs, it's just fun.
Moderator: Colors, fun, can you remember some specific experience when you have this kind of candies? What funny things does it give to you, like what you have mentioned?

Penny: I feel really happy when I eat Big Rabbit especially I moved from China and I found Big Rabbit in the Far East. And I feel so excited! Really, and when I eat it I miss my friend, my mom and such thing I think.
Zoe: I also found that Japanese candy in Far East and I was also excited.
Moderator: Is it because you eat it a lot?

Zoe: Yeah, when I was in my high school, and I hang out with my friend, and we all rushed to the grocery store to buy different kind of tastes of that candy so it kind of remind me my high school life.
Moderator: So any other people like candy remind you something?
Matthew: Movies.
Moderator: Movies?
Matthew: Yeah, when I watch the movies I will eat some candy so..
Moderator: You mean when you are watching movie, you eat some candy?
Matthew: Yeah, it's just kind of relaxing thing to do. And in movie theatre, you always eat candy when you watch movie.
Moderator: Wow, that's cool.
Mia: I eat chocolate when I'm full of homework and some other thing so I will eat some candies and that will makes me feel energetic. At other time I eat mildly because it is of high calorie.
Moderator: Yeah so you mentioned like how high calorie so you..
Mia: Eating candies is complicated because when I was boring I desire to some, but after that, just regretful to eat that.
Moderator: You after eating candies you regret?

Iris: I agree with that. I think eating candies somewhat like evil things. Because when you choose to eat them, you feel happy. But after eating that, you feel guilty. Because after eating that you take too much calorie. I think it's especially for girls.

Zoe: Yeah, I agree. I usually eat them after dinner. Because it is just said that after eating candies, or some other sweet things, when it combines with my normal meal, it won't get me too much fat. It is said so.
Moderator: Ok.
Echo: I will have candy when I feel hungry and stressful.
